projects: [{"title":"HealthNext","start_date":"Oct 2019","end_date":"Present","description":"1. Worked on designing a digital assistant chatbot along the lines of ESI handbook to generate a medical resume to support EHR.2. Piloted in East UPâ€™s largest hospital - IMS, BHU, HealthNext stood 4th at John Hopkins Healthcare Design Competition.3. Presently working on launching features such as- find the nearest medical official, make an appointment, personalized notifications.Exposure- Wireframes, Dashboards, SQL, REST API"},{"title":"TrashCash: Gamifying the waste throwing user experience","start_date":"Feb 2019","end_date":"Present","description":"TrashCash provides a Smart Kit which is retrofittable in any existing dustbin to make it a Smart Dustbin. Whenever a user throws garbage into one such bin, she/he gets Swacchta points in our Swacchta app, which is integrated into the Smart kit. These Swacchta points boost her/him up the community leaderboard and can also be redeemed as discount coupons at our partner stores. We at TrashCash want to bring a change in culture where people think before littering, by providing them incentives.Also, when the dustbin fills above 85%, the concerned authorities get notified through our Garbage Collector app which can then be followed to get an optimized route for lesser fuel consumption and more productivity."},{"title":"Modeling of Dust Generation in Mines","start_date":"Aug 2019","end_date":"Dec 2019","description":"1. Identified the factors contributing to the generation of dust, and the different approaches and methods to estimate it.2. Predicted the amount of dust generated in a pre-defined situation by various mathematical models for materialistic studies.3. Compared the results on various sets of parameters like accuracy, friction, etc. for an overview analysis of applicability.Exposure- Materialistic analysis, parameter optimization"}]
